activities: As part of Daptiv's on-demand service, customers are allowed to upload data into Daptiv servers. In this context, Daptiv acts as the processor and does not control the customer’s data. Daptiv does not choose or determine the type of data that is uploaded into the servers and any access to, or use of, such data is incidental to completing Daptiv's contractual obligations to its customer as a processor.  Daptiv is ISO/IEC 27001:2005 certified.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: All complaintants are encouraged to refer privacy issues to Daptiv at support@daptiv.com for expedited resolution. If the issue cannot be resolved to that individual's satisfaction, Daptiv will agree to mediate the issue using the appropriate European data protection authorities and/or the Better Business Bureau's EU Safe Harbor Program.
